body:
I have an existing R install that I'd like to continue to use as a dependency for new R packages.

My install of R depends on cairo, which depends on glib.

The version of glib I have was installed pre #9481, and the default tracing variant of '' was used. None is no longer a valid variant choice for tracing, so spack doesn't want to let me re-use the existing dependency.

### Error Message
```
==> Error: invalid values for variant "tracing" in package "glib": ['']
```

I've read through the conversation on #9481, and don't see anything that talks about this as an expected outcome, so I assume it was overlooked.
title: can't use existing glib due to variant change
